name: Sheeping.Inc
description: Your Boss, Commander at Area-51 HQ has given an order to steal sheep to compensate your slow work otherwise you will get fire. You play as the alien ship to capture sheep from the farmer's house. The only problem is that the farmer is very sharp at shooting and whenever he notices something unusual he shoots. So be careful while stealing sheeps and have fun. You will attract things other than sheeps. Steal sheeps within 3 minutes as much as you want and increase your high score.
